# OFTLimit
[Git Source](https://github.com/malda-protocol/malda-lending/blob/157d7bccdcadcb7388d89b00ec47106a82e67e78/src\interfaces\external\layerzero\v2\ILayerZeroOFT.sol)

*Struct representing OFT limit information.*

*These amounts can change dynamically and are up the the specific oft implementation.*


```solidity
struct OFTLimit {
    uint256 minAmountLD;
    uint256 maxAmountLD;
}
```
